      • addAdmin

        public boolean addAdmin(String n,
                        String k,
                        Main main)
        Calls SQL.addAdmin to add a new admin if he doesn´t yet exist
        Parameters:
        n - The admins "name"
        k - The key to access the acount
        Passes - on a main Object so that just a main Class can access this method
        Returns:
        Returns true in case of success and false otherwise

      • aLogin

        public int aLogin(String n,
                  String k)
        Calls SQl.aLogIn to check if an Object in table USER with the provided Values exists and may recieve this users id
        Parameters:
        n - The admins "name"
        k - The suitable key to access admin permissions
        Returns:
        Returns the id of the column that fits name and key insert if there wasn´t found a match it returns -1 if an error occurs it return -2

      • checkAdmin

        public boolean checkAdmin(int id)
        Calls SQL.acheckID to check if there exists a Object in table admin with the privided values
        Parameters:
        id - the id that needs to be searched for
        Returns:
        true if exists false if not

      • deleteKurs

        public boolean deleteKurs(int kid)
        Calls SQL.deleteKurs to delete a specific Object from KURS with the provided id and also all Links that refer on this KURS Object
        Parameters:
        kid - The id of the Kurs that ought to be deleted
        Returns:
        Returns true if the deletion was successful else returns false

      • getCharts

        public ArrayList<ProfileChart> getCharts(boolean gender,
                                         int kstu,
                                         int age,
                                         int day)
        Calls SQL.getProfileCharts to get all Objects from User that fit the provide criteria
        Parameters:
        gender - the gender of the user (result Objects have the opposite gender)
        kstu - the "level" of the dancing lesson
        age - the age of the User ! not yet used
        Returns:
        returns an Profile Chart Array

      • Login

        public int Login(String em,
                 String ps)
        Calls SQL.LogIn to Check if an Object in table USER exists having the provided attributes
        Parameters:
        em - The E-Mail of the User
        ps - The Users Password
        Returns:
        returns the id of the User

      • getProfileData

        public ProfileData getProfileData(int id)
        Calls SQL.getProfileData to get attributes from the the Obj ect in table USER with an id equals the provided id (just the User himself knows his actual id)
        Parameters:
        The - identifier of an user object in user table.
        Returns:
        Returns an ProfileData object if successful else returns null.

      • UpdateProfile

        public boolean UpdateProfile(int id,
                             String pn,
                             int height,
                             int age,
                             String pText,
                             boolean pa)
        Calls SQL.updateProfile to Update in the provided values in the USER Column that has an id equals the provided id (just the User himself knows his actual id)
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of an user object in user table.
        pn - Attribute representing the phone number of the user.
        height - Attribute representing the height of the user.
        age - Attribute representing the Users Age.
        pText - Attribute representing the Users about me text.
        pa - Tells if the users Age is set public.
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getKurs

        public ArrayList<Kurs> getKurs(int id,
                               int ks)
        Calls SQL.addLink to extract all objects from table KURS having the provided KURSSTUFE value and see if ther exist a link between the extracted object and the user that calls this method using an http request
        Parameters:
        id - The Identifer of the USER
        ks - The provied value that has to equal the Value in column KURSSTUFE
        Returns:

      • getGender

        public int getGender(int id)
        This method is called to extract the Gender of an specific user
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the user
        Returns:
        Returns the Gender of the User as int three Values are possible : 1 for female, 0 for male and -1 in case of an Error
